import classNames from "classnames"; import { RTEditor } from 'portal/scenes/Instructor/Editor' import React from "react"; import { TitleDescription } from "services/projects"; import { useState } from "react"; type SyllabusProps = { handleChange: (value: TitleDescription) => void, include: TitleDescription, toggle: () => void } export const IncludeCreate: React.FC = ({ toggle, handleChange, include }) => { const [ title, setTitle] = useState(include?.title || '') const [ description, setDescription] = useState(include?.description || '') return (
{ event.preventDefault() handleChange({ id: null, title, description, project: null, }) toggle() }} className="item-form--item-form--2egBT">
 {`New Item :`}
setTitle(event.target.value)} className="form-control" value={title || ''} />
{title?.length}
setDescription(event.target.value)} value={description || ''} id="description" className="form-control" />
{description?.length}
); };
